extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Ballast Configuration
clusters.description: This cluster is used for configuring a lighting ballast.

attributes.name: PhysicalMinLevel
attributes.description: Specifies the minimum light output the ballast can achieve according to the dimming light curve.

attributes.name: PhysicalMaxLevel
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum light output the ballast can achieve according to the dimming light curve.

attributes.name: BallastStatus
attributes.description: Specifies the status of various aspects of the ballast or the connected lights.

attributes.name: MinLevel
attributes.description: Specifies the light output when Level Control Cluster's CurrentLevel equals 1.

attributes.name: MaxLevel
attributes.description: Specifies the light output when Level Control Cluster's CurrentLevel equals 254.

attributes.name: IntrinsicBallastFactor
attributes.description: Specifies the ballast factor prior to any adjustment.

attributes.name: BallastFactorAdjustment
attributes.description: Multiplication factor applied to configured light output.

attributes.name: LampQuantity
attributes.description: Number of lamps connected to this ballast.

attributes.name: LampType
attributes.description: Type of lamps connected to the ballast.

attributes.name: LampRatedHours
attributes.description: Manufacturer rated hours of lamp use.

attributes.name: LampBurnHours
attributes.description: Cumulative operating hours since last re-lamping.

attributes.name: LampAlarmMode
attributes.description: Specifies attributes that may trigger alarms.
